buildCommand: cd ../.. && corepack prepare pnpm@9.0.0 --activate && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile=false && npx prisma generate --schema=./packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm --filter @calibr/console build
installCommand: corepack prepare pnpm@9.0.0 --activate && cd ../.. && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile=false --shamefully-hoist
